title: Strictly Come Dancing celebrity exit leaks on Twitter hours before results show
text:
Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

The results of this weekend's Strictly Come Dancing dance-off have been leaked on Twitter just hours before tonight's official vote.

A spoiler account has confirmed which two couples were left in the bottom two after the public vote, and which of them will be booted from the show when the judges have their say after the dance-off.

While Strictly's results show airs on Sundays, it is filmed on the Saturday after the main show.

This means that the result is often leaked by members of the audience who have gone to watch the show.

The Mirror knows who is going out but we are keeping it under wraps for those who want to find out tonight.

(Image: PA)

Twitter users have flamed both celebrities' performances, with one branding the winner of the dance-off "embarrassingly awful".

Another insisted the loser's performance was "slightly technically better" than the person saved by the judges for another week.

Last week's controversial results show saw Viscountess Emma Weymouth and Aljaž Skorjanec wind up in the dance-off against Dev Griffin and his Dianne Buswell, who ended up losing the judges' vote.

(Image: BBC/Guy Levy)

Fans were shocked by the decision, especially after controversy surrounding the public vote, with some viewers claiming they'd struggled to place their votes.

After his exit, Dev admitted: "I'm not going to lie I am absolutely gutted, but learning how to dance, hanging out with Dianne and the other pros and celebs… I've absolutely loved it."

Dianne added: "Dev has been absolutely amazing. His work ethic is insane. I see him everywhere practising and I couldn't have asked for a better partner.

"Thank you so much for all your time and your effort. This boy has so much talent, I'm really sad he won't be able to show you guys any more of it."

(Image: BBC/Guy Levy)

Last night's show placed Saffron Barker and AJ Prichard at the top of the leaderboard with a score of 38 out of 40 after their foxtrot.

They pipped Karim Zeroual and Amy Dowden to the post, who took home a combined score of 36.

However, David James and Nadiya Bychkova are languishing at the bottom of the leaderboard having picked up just 16 points for their jive to Michael Buble's Such A Night.

Mike Bushell and Katya Jones are in second to the bottom having scraped 21 for their samba to Jump On It by The Sugarhill Gang.

Next week's Strictly sees the return of the hotly anticipated Halloween Week, which will feature spooktacular performances from the remaining couples.

*Strictly Come Dancing: The Results returns tonight at 7.15pm on BBC1
description: The two couples who entered the dance-off have been leaked on Twitter - with a mole revealing who has been voted off
